【考法 1】 adj. 极度愤怒的：extremely angry; furious
【例】He became apo-plec-tic about wasteful government spending. 他对于政府的浪费开销变得怒不可遏。
【例】The coach was so apoplectic when the player missed the free throw
【近】choleric['kɒlərɪk], enraged, furious, incensed, indignant, infuriated, irate, ireful, outraged
【反】angerless, delighted, pleased 不生气的，高兴的
【记】 apo 音：阿婆 + complicated 阿婆情况复杂了，中风了，因为愤怒气着了；pop 爸爸 + lecture 演讲，爸爸演讲时激动易怒；
